<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/container-svc/container/stop"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Stops a Docker container with the specified parameters.

Requires the `container-svc:container:stop` permission.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

>
  
</RequestSchema>
